items.question: What types of images work best with the shadow generator?
items.answer: The shadow generator works best with clear product images and scenes that require depth. High-resolution images provide the most realistic results, especially those with clean backgrounds.

items.question: Can I customize shadow features such as angle and opacity?
items.answer: Yes! You have full control to adjust the angle, size, and opacity of the shadows, allowing you to tailor the effect to match your product presentation.

items.question: Is there a limit to how many images I can process at once?
items.answer: No, there are no limits! You can upload multiple images simultaneously, making it easy to enhance a whole collection in one go.

items.question: How does this differ from manual shadow editing?
items.answer: Our AI Shadow Generator streamlines the process, enabling rapid production without the need for extensive graphic design skills or software expertise. Manual editing can be tedious and time-consuming, while our tool delivers instant results.

items.question: What pricing model is used for the AI Shadow Generator?
items.answer: WaveSpeed operates on a flexible pay-as-you-go model with no monthly subscriptions. You only pay for the shadows you generate, ensuring you get value for your investment.

items.question: What is the expected time for shadow generation?
items.answer: Shadow generation is quick, typically taking just a few moments per image regardless of the number processed. Enjoy fast enhancements without the wait.

items.question: Do I receive commercial rights for the enhanced images?
items.answer: Absolutely! All images processed through our Shadow Generator come with full commercial usage rights, allowing you to use them for any business purposes.

items.question: What support is available if I encounter issues?
items.answer: WaveSpeed provides comprehensive support, including documentation and live chat for technical issues. We ensure users receive prompt assistance with any queries during their experience.
